about_the_game:
The war against AI has wiped out most of humanity. The last survivors are living in earth's orbit, until a rogue system assigns a task to a certain pilot...

A new generation of ARPG

RUTHLESS:1 enhances classic ARPG gameplay by offering you a wide variety of Mechs to control. Assemble a squad of up to three Mechs, carrying up to five weapons, skills and buffs, allowing you respond to threats immediately.

Sci-fi creature collecting

Assume control of 100 different Mechs. Fight enemies, loot their system cores, rebuild them as your own, or simply upgrade the ones you have. Whether you need melee or long-range, crowd control or single-target shots. You name it, you get it.

Hack and Slash

Wreak mayhem as you battle your way through hordes over hordes of enemies. The fast-paced, battle-focused gameplay grants an experience, that leaves no room for boredom.

short_description: Ruthless:1 combines ARPG Hack and Slash with creature collection and puts it into a war-torn sci-fi world. Destroy enemy Mechs, grow your army and build the ultimate roster. Countless skills and items allow you to play the style you like.
